objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
objects.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_CHIEF_VISIBILITY
objects.description:
Toggles whether or not evaluations have an evaluation chief.  Evaluation chiefs have contracting team level access in many parts of the application, so if you do not want any evaluators with elevated access, then this should be set to FALSE.

NOTE: If this toggle is set to FALSE in your environment, you will not want to place any users in the Evaluation Chairs group, as this groups also has contracting personnel level access and based on this toggle it will add/remove the Evaluation Chair group in the daily nightly process.

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_RECORD_LIST_ASSIGNMENT_DISPLAY_ONLY
objects.description: Toggles whether or not the evaluation record list displays all evaluations or just those to which the u-ser is assigned.  If TRUE, only those assigned to or created by the user will be displayed.

objects.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey
objects.description: Parses a bundle key and returns a dictionary of the `bundleName` & `labelKey`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
objects.description: Casts the input to a map list

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is null/empty. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_chooseWherecontainsHelper
objects.description: Helps when combining choose() and wherecontains(), returns 1 if no match found, or else returns the index + 1

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_createDocumentDownloadLinkLabel
objects.description: Formats a label text to include a string and a downward pointing arrow, representing a download field. For use with Document Download Links. Returns a text string.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel
objects.description: Retrieves a single label from the Common Objects bundle file

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser
objects.description: Returns a formatted user name or group name.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
objects.description: Executes displayValue, but allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
objects.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
objects.description: Returns any record that contains any of the provided values in the field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate
objects.description: Formats a date for read-only text display. Note, do not use this rule to format date times, only dates. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
objects.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl
objects.description: Returns the URL of the site, terminating in /suite/

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups
objects.description: Returns true if the user is a member of any of the groups (or condition), uses `loggedInUser()` if `user` input is null

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_left
objects.description: Executes the `left()` function with error handling for a null input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_not
objects.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

objects.description: Executes the opposite of the rule `AS_GSS_UT_isBlank`

objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

objects.name: AS_GSS_UT_returnUrlForGivenEvaluationRecord
objects.description: Expression Rule to get the URL for a particular evaluation record

objects.name: AS_GSS_UT_returnsSumOfFactorsWeight
objects.description: Returns the total sum of provided factor weights.

objects.name: AS_GSS_UT_sendEmailProcessParameters
objects.description: Rule having the process parameters for send email process in GSS

objects.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateEvaluationRecordWithAllTasks
objects.description: The rule is used to update the evaluation record with all of its related task records. Use this rule where the number of related records could go more than 100.

objects.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord
objects.description: Given a model record, updates the provided records' fields to match those of the model record.  Nulls apply if the field exists in the model record.

objects.name: AS_GSS_getUserFullName
objects.description: Returns the user full name

objects.name: AS_GSS_returnEvaluatorsStampList
objects.description: The rule is used to return the list of evaluators contents to be displayed in a stamp field in the Evaluation card

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_displayProminentAndSecondaryBodyText
objects.description: Used to display prominent and secondary body text. Don't use this in place of a header.

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_displayStylizedBodyText
objects.description: Used to display stylized body text. Pass in a value from `AS_CO_CONS_BODY_TEXT_STYLES` as the `textStyle`. Don't use this in place of a header.

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_emptySpacer
objects.description: Provides an empty spacing element to use to create empty vertical space between SAIL elements. Pass in a value from `AS_CO_CONS_EMPTY_SPACER_HEIGHTS` as the `spacingHeight`.

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
objects.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

objects.description: Standard wrapper for a!textField()
